<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="note" xml:lang="en"> 
  <citation>
    <sort>
      <key variable="issued"/>
      <key variable="title"/>
    </sort>
    <layout prefix="" suffix="." delimiter="; ">
      <group delimiter=", ">
        <text variable="title"/>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation> 
</style>
